item.title: Tricia add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "Think occasionally of the suffering of which you spare yourself the sight." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Tricia add a quote by Martin Niemöller
Tricia add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "Until he extends the circle of his compassion to all living things, man will not himself find peace." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Tricia add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.
